prompt:
Documentation changes detected in .audit/ folder. Please execute the audit documentation sync to S3:

1. Check if ENABLE_AUDIT_DOC_MODE=true in .env
2. Generate hash-based versions for changed documents
3. Add Git commit hash and timestamp to filenames
4. Sync .audit/ contents to S3 bucket: matbakhvcstack-webbucket12880f5b-svct6cxfbip5
5. Use S3 path: audit-docs/ with --acl private --delete flags
6. Optionally send Slack notification about sync completion
7. Add entry to docs/release-guidance.md: [TIMESTAMP] Audit docs synced to S3 (X files)

AWS CLI command template:
aws s3 sync .audit/ s3://matbakhvcstack-webbucket12880f5b-svct6cxfbip5/audit-docs/ --region eu-central-1 --acl private --delete

Ensure all files are private and include revision-secure timestamps and hashes for compliance tracking.
